meanings.definition: To make or become stronger or more resolute.
meanings.sent2: She believed that facing challenges stoutens one's character.
meanings.sent3: The knight's armor stoutens him for battle.
meanings.sent4: The wise words of his mentor stoutened his resolve like a shield.
meanings.sent5: The storm outside stoutened her determination to finish the project.

meanings.definition: To cause to appear more substantial or robust.
meanings.sent1: Adding more flour stoutens the dough.
meanings.sent2: The new paint color stoutened the walls of the room.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient stoutened the flavor of the soup.
meanings.sent4: The bright lights stoutened the appearance of the stage.
meanings.sent5: The tailor's skillful stitching stoutened the fabric of the dress.
